children.description: I am calling the "get_a_specific_game_for_free_nba" function with the argument "is_id" set to "12345" in order to retrieve the details of the game with ID 12345. By specifying the game ID, I can obtain information such as the date, home team, home team score, visitor team, and visitor team score of the game. Additionally, I can also retrieve player statistics for this particular game. This API call will allow me to gather all the necessary information to fulfill the user's query about the game.

the previous actions, it seems that all attempts to retrieve the game details have failed. The error message suggests an unauthorized access issue. To resolve this, I will try a different approach by using the "get_all_stats_for_free_nba" function to retrieve player statistics for the game.

ately, it seems that the unauthorized error persists even when trying to retrieve player statistics for the game. Since I am unable to retrieve the game details and player statistics, I will have to give up and restart the task.

Based on the previous action, it seems that the API request to get the details of the game with ID 12345 failed due to an unauthorized error. To handle this, I will try a different approach by using the "get_all_games_for_free_nba" function to retrieve all the games and then filter out the specific game with ID 12345. This way, I can obtain the necessary details such as the date, home team, home team score, visitor team, and visitor team score. Additionally, I can use the "get_all_stats_for_free_nba" function to retrieve the player statistics for this game.

that the API request to get all the games also failed due to an unauthorized error. This means that I am unable to retrieve the necessary details of the game with ID 12345, including the date, home team, home team score, visitor team, and visitor team score. Additionally, I cannot use the "get_all_stats_for_free_nba" function to retrieve the player statistics for this game.

Considering the repeated failures in accessing the required data, it is best to give up and restart the task.

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"
